sentence.Network_en: He took a vow of chastity and celibacy.

sentence.Network_en: People in some religious orders take a vow of celibacy.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些宗教修会的人发誓不结婚.

sentence.Network_cn: 修道者的独身观念含有禁欲与宗教热情之意.

entry.def: Celibacy is the state of being celibate.
